sentences.english: The white and blue crystals of topaz are large, often weighing thousands of carats.
sentences.chinese: 这些白色或蓝色的黄玉晶体很大，常常有数千克拉重。

sentences.english: Mikoto can't win Topaz. Oh well.
sentences.chinese: 美琴不可能赢下黄玉项链。

sentences.english: Split place, bitter water place, is the name, the yellow corn, white corn, came from there.
sentences.chinese: 在那苦水之滨，养育了黄玉米与白玉米。

sentences.english: Citrine and topaz birthstone rings come in a variety of shapes and sizes.
sentences.chinese: 黄水晶和黄玉诞生石戒指来在不同的形状和大小。

sentences.english: A variety of the diffused topaz is discovered in gem markets recently.
sentences.chinese: 一种扩散处理黄玉近期在珠宝市场上面市。

sentences.english: The topaz of Cush cannot compare with it; it cannot be bought with pure gold.
sentences.chinese: 雇士的黄玉不足与她相比，纯金也不能与她较量。

sentences.english: The golden variety of precious topaz is quite uncommon.
sentences.chinese: 金黄色的黄玉品种非常罕见。

sentences.english: A pale yellow variety of crystalline quartz resembling topaz.
sentences.chinese: 一种类似黄玉的晶体石英的淡黄色变体。

definition: Karakax County in Hotan Prefecture 和田地區|和田地区[He2 tian2 Di4 qu1], Xinjiang
sheep-fat white jade, a type of jade
jade/jade and stone/(fig.) the good and the bad
Baiyü county (Tibetan: dpal yul rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
lapis lazuli (mineral of the square albite family)
